package.name: ClassicFolders 2 (unc0ver).

dependencies.package: firmware (>= 8.0), mobilesubstrate (>= 0.9.5000), preferenceloader (>= 2.2.2), ldid, ga.jakeashacks.substitutedummy, ga.jakeashacks.sharedfix

package.shortDescription: Classic view of folders for current firmware.

descriptionlist.description:
Currently for Unc0ver users only.
The best folder redesign for your device. Configuration in Settings. No activation required.

changelog.change: Dependencies are installed from the repository https://jakeashacks.ga/cydia/
